statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, resolution FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE assigned_to = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, resolution FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005);
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status IN ('Open', 'Pending') ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_id=1;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_description, resolution_date FROM TicketResolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.customer_name, r.resolution_date FROM CustomerSupportTickets t JOIN TicketResolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id WHERE t.ticket_status='Closed';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT resolution_id, ticket_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id=12345;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%network%';
SELECT * FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT staff_id, name, role FROM staff ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, r.resolution_description FROM tickets t JOIN resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id WHERE r.resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT s.name, s.role, t.issue_description, t.status FROM staff s LEFT JOIN tickets t ON s.staff_id = t.customer_id WHERE s.role = 'Support';

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.issue_description AS issue, r.resolution_description AS resolution FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.id = t.customer_id JOIN resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id ORDER BY c.name ASC, t.issue_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, ticket_status FROM SupportTicket WHERE ticket_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Resolution WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id
SELECT ticket_description, ticket_status, customer_id FROM SupportTicket WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT resolution_details, resolution_date FROM Resolution WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer JOIN SupportTicket ON Customer.customer_id = SupportTicket.customer_id WHERE ticket_status = 'Pending'
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employee JOIN TicketAssignment ON Employee.employee_id = TicketAssignment.employee_id
